member.name: T:Tizen.Applications.ComponentBased.ComponentInfo
member.summary: This class provides methods and properties to get information of the component.

members.member:
A constructor of ComponentInfo that takes the component ID.
Component ID. Thrown when failed because of an invalid argument. Thrown when failed because of the system error. Thrown when failed because of out of memory. Thrown when failed because of permission denied.> http://tizen.org/privilege/packagemanager.info 6

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.ComponentBased.ComponentInfo.Finalize
member.summary: Destructor of the class.

member.name: P:Tizen.Applications.ComponentBased.ComponentInfo.ComponentId
member.summary: Gets the component ID.

member.name: P:Tizen.Applications.ComponentBased.ComponentInfo.ApplicationId
member.summary: Gets the application ID of the component.

member.name: P:Tizen.Applications.ComponentBased.ComponentInfo.ComponentType
member.summary: Gets the type of the component.

member.name: P:Tizen.Applications.ComponentBased.ComponentInfo.IsIconDisplayed
member.summary: Checks whether the icon of the component should be displayed or not.

member.name: P:Tizen.Applications.ComponentBased.ComponentInfo.IsManagedByTaskManager
member.summary: Checks whether the component should be managed by task-manager or not.

member.name: P:Tizen.Applications.ComponentBased.ComponentInfo.IconPath
member.summary: Gets the absolute path of the icon image.

member.name: P:Tizen.Applications.ComponentBased.ComponentInfo.Label
member.summary: Gets the label of the component.

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.ComponentBased.ComponentInfo.GetLocalizedLabel(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the localized label of the component for the given locale.
member.remarks: The format of locale is language and country code. (available value: "[2-letter lowercase language code (ISO 639-1)]-[2-letter lowercase country code (ISO 3166-alpha-2)]")

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.ComponentBased.ComponentInfo.Dispose
member.summary: Releases all resources used by the ComponentInfo class.

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.ComponentBased.ComponentInfo.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Releases all resources used by the ComponentInfo class.

member.name: T:Tizen.Applications.ComponentBased.ComponentManager
member.summary: This class has the methods and events of the ComponentManager.

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.ComponentBased.ComponentManager.GetInstalledComponentsAsync
member.summary: Gets the information of the installed components asynchronously.
member.exception: Thrown when failed because of an invalid argument.
Thrown when failed because of the "component not exist" error or the system error.
Thrown when failed because of out of memory.
Thrown when failed because of permission denied.

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.ComponentBased.ComponentManager.GetRunningComponentsAsync
member.summary: Gets the information of the running components asynchronously.
member.exception: Thrown when failed because of an invalid argument.
Thrown when failed because of the "component not exist" error or the system error.
Thrown when failed because of out of memory.
Thrown when failed because of permission denied.

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.ComponentBased.ComponentManager.IsRunning(System.String)
member.summary: Checks whether the component is running or not.
member.returns: Returns true if the component is running, otherwise false.
member.exception: Thrown when failed because of an invalid argument.
Thrown when failed because of the "component not exist" error or the system error.
Thrown when failed because of out of memory.
Thrown when failed because of permission denied.

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.ComponentBased.ComponentManager.TerminateBackgroundComponent(Tizen.Applications.ComponentBased.ComponentRunningContext)
member.summary: Terminates the component if it is running in the background.
member.exception: Thrown when failed because of an invalid argument.
Thrown when failed because of the "component not exist" error or the system error.
Thrown when failed because of out of memory.
Thrown when failed because of permission denied.
member.remarks: This function returns after it just sends a request for terminating a background component. Platform will decide if the target component could be terminated or not according to the state of the target component.

member.name: T:Tizen.Applications.ComponentBased.ComponentRunningContext
member.summary: This class provides methods and properties to get information of the running component.

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.ComponentBased.ComponentRunningContext.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: A constructor of ComponentRunningContext that takes the component ID.
member.exception: Thrown when failed because of an invalid argument.
Thrown when failed because of the "component not exist" error or the system error.
Thrown when failed because of out of memory.
Thrown when failed because of permission denied.

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.ComponentBased.ComponentRunningContext.Finalize
member.summary: Destructor of the class.

member.name: T:Tizen.Applications.ComponentBased.ComponentRunningContext.ComponentState
member.summary: Enumeration for the component state.

member.name: F:Tizen.Applications.ComponentBased.ComponentRunningContext.ComponentState.Initialized
member.summary: The Initialized state. This is the state when the component is constructed but OnCreate() is not called yet.

member.name: F:Tizen.Applications.ComponentBased.ComponentRunningContext.ComponentState.Created
member.summary: The created state. This state is reached after OnCreate() is called.

member.name: F:Tizen.Applications.ComponentBased.ComponentRunningContext.ComponentState.Started
member.summary: The started state. This state is reached after OnStart() or OnStartCommand() is called.

member.name: F:Tizen.Applications.ComponentBased.ComponentRunningContext.ComponentState.Resumed
member.summary: The resumed state. This state is reached after OnResume() is called.

member.name: F:Tizen.Applications.ComponentBased.ComponentRunningContext.ComponentState.Paused
member.summary: The paused state. This state is reached after OnPause() is called.

member.name: F:Tizen.Applications.ComponentBased.ComponentRunningContext.ComponentState.Destroyed
member.summary: The destroyed state. This state is reached right before OnDestroy() call.

member.name: P:Tizen.Applications.ComponentBased.ComponentRunningContext.ComponentId
member.summary: Gets the ID of the component.

member.name: P:Tizen.Applications.ComponentBased.ComponentRunningContext.ApplicationId
member.summary: Gets the application ID of the component.

member.name: P:Tizen.Applications.ComponentBased.ComponentRunningContext.InstanceId
member.summary: Gets the instance ID of the component.

member.name: P:Tizen.Applications.ComponentBased.ComponentRunningContext.State
member.summary: Gets the state of the component.

member.name: P:Tizen.Applications.ComponentBased.ComponentRunningContext.IsTerminated
member.summary: Checks whether the component is terminated or not.

member.name: P:Tizen.Applications.ComponentBased.ComponentRunningContext.IsSubComponent
member.summary: Checks whether the component is running as sub component of the group.

member.name: M:Tizen.Applications.ComponentBased.ComponentRunningContext.Resume
member.summary: Resumes the running component.
member.exception: Thrown when failed because of an invalid argument.
Thrown when failed because of the system error.
Thrown when failed because of out of memory.
Thrown when failed because of permission denied.

member.summary: Pauses the running component.
member.exception: Thrown when failed because of an invalid argument.
Thrown when failed because of the system error.

Thrown when failed because of permission denied.

member.summary: Terminates the running component.
member.exception: Thrown when failed because of an invalid argument.
Thrown when failed because of the system error.
